mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (name, id, pass, reg_date, email, origin_pic, stored_pic, auth_key, auth_status) VALUES (#{name}, #{id}, #{pass}, now(), #{email}, #{originPic}, #{storedPic}, #{authKey}, #{authStatus})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user WHERE email=#{email}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user WHERE id=#{id}
SELECT auth_key FROM user WHERE email=#{email}
SELECT id FROM user WHERE email=#{email} AND pass=#{pass}
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET auth_key=#{authKey} WHERE email=#{email}
UPDATE user SET auth_status=1 WHERE auth_key=#{authKey} and email=#{email}
